content: निकारः {@--1@} Winnowing corn. {@--2@} Lifting up. {@--3@} Killing, slaughter. {@--4@} Humiliation, subjugation. {@--5@} Insult, injury, wrong, offence; तीर्णो निकारार्णवः <ls>Ve. 6. 43</ls>; <ls>Mv. 3. 41</ls>; <ls n="Mv.">5. 14</ls>; <ls n="Mv.">7. 8</ls>; <ls>Ki. 1. 43</ls>; <ls n="Ki.">3. 44.</ls> {@--6@} Abuse, reproach, disrespect. {@--7@} Wickedness, malice. {@--8@} Opposition, contradiction.
